venue.name: Parking Lot Near Barking Dog Restaurant

item.description:
::: DUE TO INCLEMENT WEATHER PREDICTIONS, THIS MEETUP IS RESCHEDULED TO SUNDAY 12/6 :::

Each year, the shopkeepers in downtown Amesbury square compete for prizes and bragging rights to the best holiday window display.

Downtown Amesbury is a quaint New England town center with it's history evident in the old mill buildings and shops. The Pow Wow river runs through downtown creating waterfalls at different levels of the area at heights up to approximately 20 feet.

There's lots to shoot here and the holiday activities will only add to the opportunities.

In addition, Amesbury is part of the Essex National Heritage Area. Beth posted a notice about an annual photo contest being held by the national heritage organization. You can learn more about it here... http://www.essexherit... and here... http://www.meetup.com....

While we will miss this year's deadline, we will be able to get images to submit for next year's deadline if you want to enter.

We'll spend a while shooting in the town square area and then be on hand as it gets dark to shoot the lighted window displays.

I'll be posting more information as the date approaches regarding directions.

Hope you can make it.

Thanks... Dianne
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot near the Barking Dog restaurant.
item.name: RESCHEDULED: Amesbury Holiday Lights
